definitions.definition: break or fail to comply with (a rule or formal agreement).
examples: they violated the terms of a ceasefire
synonyms: trample on "this violates fundamental human rights"

definitions.definition: fail to respect (someone's peace, privacy, or rights).
examples: they denied that human rights were being violated
synonyms: intrude upon; disrespect "they felt their privacy had been violated"

definitions.definition: treat (something sacred) with irreverence or disrespect.
examples: he was accused of violating a tomb

rape, sexually assault, assault, force oneself on, abuse, attack, molest, interfere with; Morearchaicdefile, deflower, dishonor, ruin; literaryravish "he drugged and then violated her"Moredefile, deflower, dishonor, ruin; ravish he drugged and then violated her
